title: How long does the average winning streak go for?
body: Not in norms or ARAMS tho, in ranked.

replies.body:
10:10  w:l 
mmr gives 10 favourable and 10 unfavourable games
winning the unfavourable is what will increase youre rank.
i won 40 games in a row, my mmr got so high that i got 4 ciggy butt brain team mates for like 8 games in a row
ITT people don't understand what average means.
Went 13 wins in a row when I smashed from b4 to almost b1 got that silver and haven't really played rank since :S
